body_html: @TomAshley303, this is a pretty awesome info to get! I don't plan to recompile from source. I don't want to. But the info tells me what to do if my model becomes big and slow and will need a performance boost. It's usually cheaper to recompile with extensions than to buy new hardware, given that having good walkthroughts (which we do have) minimizes the labour cost of recompiling (CPU time does not matter, can run overnight).
